trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Push** tab, select **Only Authenticated Users** for **Permissions**, click **Save**, and then click **Edit Script**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Push** tab, select **Only Authenticated Users** for **Permissions**, click **Save**, and then click **Edit Script**.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to customize the push notification registration callback function.
trans-unit.target: This allows you to customize the push notification registration callback function.

trans-unit.source: If you use Git to edit your source code, this same registration function is found in `.\service\extensions\push.js`.
trans-unit.target: If you use Git to edit your source code, this same registration function is found in `.\service\extensions\push.js`.

trans-unit.source: Replace the existing **register** function with the following code and then click **Save**:
trans-unit.target: Replace the existing **register** function with the following code and then click **Save**:

trans-unit.source: This adds a tag to the registration that is the ID of the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: This adds a tag to the registration that is the ID of the logged-in user.

trans-unit.source: The supplied tags are validated to prevent a user from registering for another user's ID.
trans-unit.target: The supplied tags are validated to prevent a user from registering for another user's ID.

trans-unit.source: When a notification is sent to this user, it is received on this and any other device registered by the user.
trans-unit.target: When a notification is sent to this user, it is received on this and any other device registered by the user.

trans-unit.source: Click the back arrow, click the **Data** tab, click **TodoItem**, click **Script**, and then select **Insert**.
trans-unit.target: Click the back arrow, click the **Data** tab, click **TodoItem**, click **Script**, and then select **Insert**.
